Articles.Content:
Just found this on a Simpson episode can't remember which one though

Anyone else seen that episode or seen hens name anywhere else?

Sorry about the quality took it with my phone

Jebediah Springfield is the man who founded the town of Springfield in the Simpsons Universe, there have been a few episodes dedicated to his history.

http://simpsons.wikia.com/wiki/Jebediah_Springfeld
This has nothing to do with KSP.
Jeb Springfield predates Jeb Kerman by a good, what, 20 years? Good looking out, though. The next thing this thread needs is a shop of KSP Jeb over Simpsons Jeb

This has nothing to do with KSP.

Well it is jebadiah... Just thought I'd share it with you
Something similar, in Psych, one of the main character's middle name is Jebediah.

A noble spirit embiggens the smallest rocket.

But yeah I remember an episode in the first series where Bart is coerced into cutting off the head of the statue.

http://i57.tinypic.com/wb81le.jpg

Just found this on a Simpson episode can't remember which one though

Anyone else seen that episode or seen hens name anywhere else?

Sorry about the quality took it with my phone

I sure everyone remembers this thread too: http://kerman.com.au/

Jeb Springfield predates Jeb Kerman by a good, what, 20 years? Good looking out, though. The next thing this thread needs is a shop of KSP Jeb over Simpsons Jeb

It just had to be done!

I was actually watching random Simpsons episodes when I saw this post and by chance was on a episode with a very Kerbal start;

This was from season 13 (ep6), so eons ago, so no actual connection but anyway;

Simpson rocket v1;

The predictable result

The very Kerbal solution

The very Kerbal result
Awesome!! That's a good bit of editing!
I suppose Jebediah Springfield might have subconsciously affected the Squad guys, and resulted in Jeb Kerman... The timeline kind of matches up .
Maybe Squad could get Jeb in for a guest appearance, they must be desperate for ideas by now.
Perhaps there is a town on Kerbin called Pringfield that has in its center a statue of Jebediah.
